extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is affected by retrieving the installed version of macOS, iOS, iPadOS, tvOS, or Safari.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by the vulnerability?

extracted_playbook.title: Update Affected Devices
extracted_playbook.description: Update macOS to version 12.7, 13.6, or 14.3; iOS and iPadOS to version 16.7 or 17.3; tvOS to version 17.3; Safari to version 17.3.
